nodes.text: Number Two, also referred to as the Unit Two, was an All Terrain Armored Transport used by the Imperial Army of the Galactic Empire. In 9 ABY, it was sent to Myrkr by Grand Admiral Thrawn under General Covell, to attack the smuggler Talon Karrde's base there. It served alongside other AT-ATs, like the Number Four, and All Terrain Scout Transports.
